user.title: Set up Sofabaton Hub
user.description: Enter the MAC address of your Hub and your MQTT Broker connection details. The MQTT Broker is typically the Mosquitto add-on in Home Assistant.

data.name: Hub Name
data.host: MQTT Broker IP Address (e.g., localhost or 192.168.1.100)

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of your MQTT broker (usually 'localhost' if using Mosquitto add-on)
data_description.port: Port number of your MQTT broker (default is 1883)
data_description.username: Username for MQTT broker authentication (leave empty if not required)
data_description.password: Password for MQTT broker authentication (leave empty if not required)

zeroconf_confirm.title: Discovered Sofabaton Hub: {name}
zeroconf_confirm.description: A Sofabaton Hub was found on your network. Please provide your MQTT Broker connection details to complete the setup. The MQTT Broker is typically the Mosquitto add-on in Home Assistant.

data.host: MQTT Broker IP Address (e.g., localhost or 192.168.1.100)

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of your MQTT broker (usually 'localhost' if using Mosquitto add-on)
data_description.port: Port number of your MQTT broker (default is 1883)
data_description.username: Username for MQTT broker authentication (leave empty if not required)
data_description.password: Password for MQTT broker authentication (leave empty if not required)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to MQTT broker. Please check that the MQTT integration is configured and connected.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials for MQTT broker.
error.invalid_mac: Invalid MAC address format. It should be 12 hex characters without separators.
